front.title: The LDAP Client Caching Proxy Model

abstract.t: This document describes an LDAP 'caching proxy' model for use onmobile clients. The caching proxy speeds up LDAP accesses by cachingand enables access to LDAP directory content & execution of directoryapplications in offline mode. It includes a description of the modeland identifies LDAP control extensions for proxy operation, cache-control & cache-management.
